QuestData.Title: The Challenger's Fires
QuestData.Description: You're strong of mind and strong of will, but you lack the skills to face me in combat. You must fight with your body, but in truth, it is your character that is being tested.$B$BLet us even the playing field.$B$BTake this torch, light it in the brazier next to me, and then use it to light the three unlit braziers around the pool.
QuestData.LogDescription: Light your Unlit Challenger's Torch at the Brazier of Flickering Flame, then use it to light the 3 braziers near Master Li Fei.
QuestData.RewardText: These fires will give you the strength that you've not yet obtained. They will illuminate your potential.
